stimulusHtml: The electric field Eâ†’ created by a single point charge in a region of space is represented by the electric field map shown in the figure. Which of the following could produce the field map shown?
choicesHtml: A positive point charge located to the left of the region depicted
A positive point charge located to the right of the region depicted
A negative point charge located to the left of the region depicted
A negative point charge located to the right of the region depicted
